content: this pattern is free to members of the woolly hat society 1 in pdf format for the rest of the month it can also be found free on my blog 2 thanks to my patreon supporters 3 for helping to continue to produce new free patterns patreons have perpetual access to my free patterns in my custom layout pdfs **yarn** 100g/230yd/211m 4ply/sock weight single or plied yarn **needles & notions** set 2 75mm/uk12/us2 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch markers as necessary tapestry needle **sample details** shown in mollygirl yarn unplugged lite 230yd/211m per 50g 100% peruvian wool shown in size 20in/50 75cm on model with 20in/50 75cm circumference head **gauge** 27 sts x 42 row to 4in/10cm on 2 75mm needles over stocking st 28 sts x 44 row to 4in/10cm on 2 75mm needles over twisted rib **sizes** to fit size 17 19 20 21 23 24 in/43 25 48 25 50 75 53 25 58 5 61 cm finished size 14 75 16 17 25 18 25 19 5 20 5 in/37 5 40 75 43 75 46 25 49 5 52 cm **note** notes about adjusting depth and achieving additional sizes are included **skills required** knit & purl sts knitting in the round jogless stripes increases & decreases **support** do you need help with this pattern we have a specific discussion thread in the wormhead s hats group 4 where you can ask any questions **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background and does not rely on colour 1 https //www woollywormhead com/the-woolly-hat-society 2 https //www woollywormhead com/blog/2022/10/25/free-pattern-the-ridged-slouch 3 https //www patreon com/woollywormhead 4 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/4236839
